subject: Re: [junit] Re: this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource("/") is 	null
msgSnippet: My suggestion is: 1) split the method into three: String findPath() { return this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource(SLASH); } ? furtherProcessing(String
messageBody:
My suggestion is:

1) split the method into three:

String findPath() { return
this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource(SLASH); }
? furtherProcessing(String path) { // the further processing needed }
? originalMethod(...) { return furtherProcessing(findPath()); }

2) Test furtherProcessing in isolation
3) If you're truly concerned that findPath() will do the wrong thing,
we can think harder and come up with some tricks.

Make sense?

David Saff
